p: Chen et al. [ 47] isolated several new compounds from the aerial part of Eupatorium cannabinum subsp. asiaticum Kitam. and assessed their antiinflammatory activities. 9-(3-Methylbutanoyl)-8,10-dehydrothymol 58 and eupatobenzofuran 59 exhibit fMLP/CB (formyl-l-methionyl-l-leucyl-l-phenylalanine/cytochalasin B)-induced elastase release with IC 50 values ≤ 18.3 μM ( Figure 13).
